(0, 0, 2): Chagatai Khanate, Цагаадайн Хаант Улс, Tsagadaina Khaanat Ulus
(1, 1, 1): Nomadic empire, Division of the Mongol Empire
(4, 1, 1): Shamanism, Buddhism, Tengrism (earlier), Sunni Islam (later), Naqshbandi[citation needed]
(10, 0, 1): Chagatai Khan inherited part of Mongol Empire
(12, 0, 1): Chagatai Khanate split into Western Chagatai Khanate and Moghulistan
